extendedInfo.description: Drivers Ed North Carolina is brought to you free of charge by DriversEd.com!Need your North Carolina driver's license? Study anytime, anyplace with Drivers Ed  North Carolina for Android devices! Don't be one of the 70% of people who fail their DMV test the first time!FREE from DriversEd.com, the leader in online driver's ed, this full-featured study companion can quiz you from a database of more than 350 DMV questions. Pick the length of each test: take a test of 5 questions, or as many as 100. It's your choice!Your results are recorded, so you can track your progress and review your incorrect answers. Retake past tests unlimited times to make sure you know the material.Use the Flash Card feature to study the important facts you need to know for the test.Of course, you'll still need to read the North Carolina Driverâs Handbook to prepare for the permit test. With Drivers Ed North Carolina, you can download the North Carolina Driverâs Handbook to your device anytime! (It downloads only once, and is saved to your device, so you don't ever have to wait for it again.)The North Carolina Driver's Handbook is an official DMV publication, in PDF format. The text is crystal-clear, and you can pinch to zoom, just like a web page.For more driving information and tips, visit www.DriversEd.com.

reviews.comment: It gives the wrong answers. I checked my DMV booklet&what the book says&what this app says... &It\'s completely different. First it says one answer is \"correct\', then after a while of taking a few tests. The same question is asked, but it marks another question as \"correct\". It\'s really confusing&mind boggling....
reviews.author: Isabelle Rosas

reviews.title: Andriana
reviews.comment: It\'s wrong and some answers don\'t show up. Waste of download
reviews.author: Andriana Dollison

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I downloaded this two days ago, and I passed my written test.
reviews.author: April Gionet

reviews.title: Try it
reviews.comment: Perfect helped me out a lot and I passed only with two wrong
reviews.author: Michelle grimes

reviews.title: Incorrect Information
reviews.comment: After taking multiple tests and checking the answers against the NC manual I have found many of them to be incorrect. If anything this app has set me back. Deleted it.
reviews.author: A Google User
